other_tests.findings: Developed biopsy site pain immediately after.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Pain was much better, denied N/V/fever/chills after the procedure.

other_tests.findings: Subsegmental atelectasis in both lung bases; gallbladder slightly distended with T1 hyperintense and T2 hypointense sludge ball at the neck; gallbladder wall thickened with pericholecystic inflammatory changes; trace amount of perihepatic ascites; small fluid collection adjacent to segment VI unchanged from prior study.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Small fluid collection adjacent segment VI is unchanged from prior study.
